core.constraints

Class BaseConstraints

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.constraints.BaseConstraints
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Constraints

    public abstract class BaseConstraints
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class BaseConstraints keeps track of constraints and fragments in order to check if two rows are considered alike in a fragment (either for a single constraint or for all the ones insisting on the fragment).

    • Field Summary

      The constraints cache for memoization.

      The involved fragments cache for memoization.

      abstract boolean areRowsAlike(Row row1, Row row2, int fragmentId)
      Check if two rows are alike wrt to a fragment for at least one constraint.

      Check if two rows are alike wrt to a fragment for a specific constraint.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> constraintsFor(int fragmentId)
      Returns the constraints for a fragment using a memoization pattern (dynamic programming) using a cache.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> involvedFragmentsFor(int constraintId)
      Returns the involved fragments for a constraint using a memoization pattern (dynamic programming) using a cache.
